name: Project Rogue Monsters Prototype
description:
This is a short prototype for a game that I hope to work more on in the future.  In this game, inspired by Pokemon and the Binding of Isaac (among other games), you go through a randomly generated cave to fight and catch creatures.  Train your monsters and try to reach the deepest level of the cave.  The final game will contain creatures such as cows that produce caffeinated beverages instead of milk, haunted balloon animals, psychic weasels, lab mice with unsteady elemental control, cat slime, lava turtles, and many others.

Field Controls:
Arrow Keys: move around
Battle Controls:
Arrow Keys: navigate menu
Enter: select move
Space: Switches Background type

Known Bugs:

  • Using Speed Up repeatedly will cause your speed bar to overflow

Credits:

Battle Background sprite was ripped from Earthbound, but the distortion shaders were made by me.
